titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 471) to reauthorize the DC opportunity scholarship program, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-45, by Mr. Bishop (UT).
The amendment recommended by the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform now printed in the bill shall be considered as adopted. All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 21.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 186.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 182 (Roll no. 199).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 178 (Roll no. 200).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/29/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 471) to reauthorize the DC opportunity scholarship program.
